text: us din munaafik mard aur munaafik auraten eemaanadaaron se kahenge ek nazar (shafakqat) hamaaree taraf bhee karo ki ham bhee tumhaare noor se kuchh raushanee haasil karen to (unase) kaha jaega ki tum apane peechhe (duniya mein) laut jao aur (vahee) kisee aur noor kee talaash karo phir unake beech mein ek deevaar khadee kar dee jaegee jisamen ek daravaaza hoga (aur) usake andar kee jaanib to rahamat hai aur baahar kee taraph azaab to munaafiqeen momineen se pukaar kar kahenge
